toeic-200.title: TOEIC 200 Vocabulary 2023 Q4
toeic-200.description: Comprehensive vocabulary list for TOEIC test preparation, including parts of speech and example sentences.

card1.meaning: dịch vụ, sự phục vụ, bảo trì và sửa chữa (sau bán hàng)
examples: This service is free to sb.
After 5 years of service as CEO.
Provide a much-needed service to sb.

card2.meaning: đặt hàng, đơn hàng, trình tự, chỉ thị, mệnh lệnh
examples: The order should be placed by midnight.
Provide the details of your job responsibilities.

card4.meaning: cung cấp, đề nghị, đề xuất
examples: Offer a 10 percent discount to sb.
Last longer than those made by competitors.
Leave a lasting impression on sb.
Be scheduled to depart every 5 minutes.
Following the tour of the local plant.

card10.meaning: vị trí, tình hình, hoàn cảnh, lập trường, ý kiến
examples: Hold a position for three years.
Be required on the registration form.

card12.meaning: yêu cầu, đòi hỏi, đề nghị
examples: To request items for the event.

card15.meaning: tăng lên, nhân lên, lớn thêm
examples: Due to an increase in the demand for...

card16.meaning: có sẵn, có thể tìm được (đồ vật); rảnh, có thời gian (người)
examples: Be available to work on weekends.
Due to the increasing need for...
Use grains only from local farms.
Be essential to the local economy.
Cancel the conference due to bad weather.
Submit a work report by Friday.
Survey techniques used in the marketing industry.
Be available for use by sb.

card22.meaning: đặt, để, bố trí, nơi chốn, địa điểm, vị trí
examples: Place an advertisement in the newspaper.

card24.meaning: gần đây, mới đây, mới xảy ra
examples: The recent merger of A and B.

card25.meaning: hoán đổi, trở về, hoàn lại (hàng hóa, khoản thu nhập, tiền lời)

card26.meaning: sản phẩm mua được, vật đã mua, việc mua sắm
examples: Thank you for your recent purchase of...
Offer free delivery for all purchases.
Purchase drinks from the convenience store.
Begin construction of the new city hall building.
Plan the construction of a new stadium.
The construction of a new parking lot.

card28.meaning: đến kỳ, đến hạn, phải trả
examples: Be due two weeks from the checkout date.
Due to a scheduled fire safety inspection.

card30.meaning: cần bao lâu, mang theo/dẫn (đặt theo), đi (phương tiện giao thông)
examples: Take over as the new CEO.

card31.meaning: dễ dàng, lệ thuộc, chịu ảnh hưởng
examples: Be subject to change without notice.

card32.meaning: khách hàng (của một sản phẩm dịch vụ)
examples: One of our most important clients.
Receive high ratings for client satisfaction.
Check the manufacturing process for efficiency.

card34.meaning: phát biểu, cho biết, công bố
examples: Announce the sales figures for December.
Win the Best Employee of the Year award.

card36.meaning: ngay lập tức, sớm muốn, lát nữa
examples: As soon as Ms. Glenn returns from the trip.

card37.meaning: được phát minh, được thiết kế, có ý định
examples: Be designed to be more energy-efficient.

card38.meaning: mở ra, đăng cai, tổ chức (sự kiện)
examples: A reception party will be held tomorrow evening.
Be held in the main conference room.
Have a good experience with the company.
Write an article for the company newsletter.
A short article related to local tourism activities.
Thank you for submitting your article.
Has recently been awarded a contract.

card44.meaning: vận chuyển, giao hàng, chuyên chở
examples: Once your order has been shipped.

card45.meaning: hạng mục, tài khoản, khách hàng

card46.meaning: sự vận chuyển, sự phân phối, sự giao hàng

examples: In an effort to ensure accuracy.
Please ensure that all labels are printed correctly.

card48.meaning: sự ủng hộ, sự giúp đỡ, sự hỗ trợ
examples: Support an after-school program for children.

card49.meaning: mong đợi, dự đoán, cho rằng

card50.meaning: thiết bị, dụng cụ, đồ dùng cần thiết
examples: An inventory of the electronic equipment.
Sign up to attend the workshop.
Be invited to attend a dinner reception.

card52.meaning: nguyên liệu, chất liệu, tư liệu

card53.meaning: gặp gỡ, đáp ứng, làm thỏa mãn

examples: A sufficient supply of natural resources.

card55.meaning: trong trách, điều khoản, chính sách
examples: To remind you of a few policies.
Update the company policy relating to...

card56.meaning: thành tích, sự biểu diễn, tính năng
examples: The performance of a new printer.

card57.meaning: thông báo, cho biết, bảo tin cho, truyền thông tin cho

card58.meaning: sự bổ sung, sự thêm vào (nhân viên, quân số)
examples: The addition of a new dish to the special menu.

card59.meaning: hợp đồng, sự giao kèo, giấy ký kết
examples: A copy of the sales contract.
According to the terms of the contract.

card60.meaning: xác định vị trí, định vị; nằm ở, có trụ sở ở
examples: The entrance to the parking garage is located on the east side of the building.
His office is located in the northern part of the city.

card61.meaning: một lần, trước đó, ngay khi, vừa mới

card62.meaning: ứng tuyển, đăng ký, áp dụng
examples: Apply different ideas to the new marketing strategy.

card63.meaning: vị trí, địa điểm, cơ quan
examples: Open a new location in New York.
An improvement on the early version.

card66.meaning: ở phía trước, tiến về phía trước
examples: Forward product inquiries to the sales department.
As part of the new policy.
Take part in the research project.

card68.meaning: phát hiện, tìm ra, nhận thấy
examples: Please find enclosed a complimentary ticket.

card69.meaning: trường hợp, sự kiện, cuộc thi

card70.meaning: thành công, thắng lợi, thành đạt

card72.meaning: tính bổ sung, thêm vào, phụ vào
examples: Be charged an additional fee for...
Be pleased to offer a new service.
Be very pleased to announce that...
All forms of payment except credit cards.
Take place next Monday instead of this Friday.
Wait for e-mail reports instead of visiting branch offices.
Thank you for your interest in...

card79.meaning: đúng hơn là, phần nào, tương đối
examples: Rather slow in the second quarter.
Target new markets rather than downsizing.
All expenses for the current year.
Add new members to the current staff.

card81.meaning: dựa trên, đặt trụ sở tại
examples: Based on the reviews of our new product.
A multinational company based in Syracuse, New York.

card82.meaning: người đăng ký, người dự tuyển, ứng viên

card83.meaning: đơn đăng ký, đơn xin ứng tuyển, ứng dụng
examples: An application for a bank loan.
Accept application for the position of...
The requirements for the opening position.

card85.meaning: gửi kèm, đính kèm, đóng bao
examples: Enclose an invoice with the product.
A gift certificate is enclosed in the package.

card86.meaning: vì vậy, cho nên, vì thế, vậy nên
examples: Have more functions, therefore increasing the cost.
The deadline has been moved forward, and therefore we need more staff.
You have ordered ten items. Therefore, you are eligible for an extra one for free.

card87.meaning: từ đầu đến cuối, suốt, khắp
examples: Cause traffic delays throughout the downtown area.
Available in stores throughout the country.
"No Pet" signs are posted throughout the subway.

card88.meaning: cuộc điều tra, phiếu khảo sát

card89.meaning: quyết định, năng lực phân quyết

examples: Be interested in the sales position.

card91.meaning: sau đó, khi ấy, lúc đó
examples: Complete the online form and then submit it.
Ms. Logan immediately checked the inventory. She then arranged shipment of the missing item.
Be located near the convention center.
As long as your order is placed by 5 p.m., we will be able to ship your order tomorrow morning.

card96.meaning: phục vụ, làm việc, cung cấp (thực phẩm)

examples: Be postponed until later this week.
Will be announced at a later time.
The latest version of the software.
Our offer of employment with sb.
Office supplies including pens, staples, and post-it notes.
Answer all questions within 24 hours, including those posted on our website.

card104.meaning: sự chấp thuận, sự đồng tình
examples: Be subject to approval by the board of directors.
Receive approval to hire new employees.
Require the final approval from the marketing director.
Your application has been approved. Accordingly, $1000 will be deposited into your bank account.

card106.meaning: nhà sản xuất, hãng sản xuất
examples: The world's largest manufacturers of power tools.
See a dramatic increase in employee productivity.
Improve product quality as well as employee productivity.
Become an increasingly popular venue for...
Provided that you have the original receipt.
Provided that it shows no sign of damage.
Provided that the budget plan is approved.
You must show your ticket at the main gate. Additionally, you need to present your identification at the security desk.
Renew your subscription now and get a 30% discount. Additionally, renewing now gives you the chance to receive 4 free issues.
Find it helpful to join local business clubs.
Protect your equipment from costly damage.

card116.meaning: cân nhắc, coi trọng, xem xét
examples: In order to be considered for the position.
Late applications will not be considered.
Supply all the materials needed for the construction project.
Supply all new staff with business cards.
Information on how to repair the washing machine.
If your order is significantly delayed.
Accept applications from thousands of job candidates.

card122.meaning: sự biến hóa, sự thay đổi
examples: Make some changes to the plan.
Change the name of our business from KRG Consulting to CID Innovation.
Tonight's keynote speaker has been changed.

card123.meaning: mô tả những nét nổi bật, đề cao
examples: Feature a panel of market analysts.
Have more useful features than any other brands.

card124.meaning: giải quyết, xử lý, gửi thẳng (bưu phẩm), diễn thuyết
examples: Address many issues at the meeting.
Continue enjoying the convenience of online payment.
If your computer continues to malfunction.
Will continue for two more weeks.

card126.meaning: thúc đẩy, thăng chức, xúc tiến, đẩy mạnh
examples: Promote their ideas to potential customers.
Janice was promoted to store manager.
Launch an advertising campaign to promote its new products.
Result in a higher quality product.
The results from the latest analysis.
As a result of an excellent training program.
Recorded one's highest profits this quarter.
Have a close relationship for many years.
Request a transfer to the branch close to one's hometown.
As discussed in our telephone conversation.
Meet once a week to discuss future projects.

card131.meaning: chú ý, lưu tâm, nói đến, đề cập đến
examples: Please note that the shipping takes three business days.
As noted in our service agreement.
Please note that a department head's signature is required on the form.
Expand its delivery service into the northern region of the city.
Expand beyond the North American markets.

card133.meaning: cải thiện, cải tiến, cải tạo, trau dồi

card134.meaning: đề án, đề xuất, đề nghị, kế hoạch
examples: The proposal presented by the marketing manager.
How to write a business proposal.

card135.meaning: việc hoàn tiền, sự trả lại
examples: Do not offer refunds on sale items.
Have a charge of $100 on one's account.
Hire extra editors to meet the deadline.
Be hired to lead the sales division.

card138.meaning: đề xuất, đề nghị, đưa ra
examples: If you have ideas you would like to propose.

card139.meaning: cơ sở vật chất, trang thiết bị
examples: Sign up for a guided tour of the facility.
Have a recreation center and other facilities.

card140.meaning: đăng ký, ghi vào sổ, vào sổ
examples: Call in advance to register for the guided tour.
Visit our website and register today.
Be selected to receive this year's award.
Meet to select the company's new vice president.
Offer new customers a 20 percent discount.

card143.meaning: thông tin chi tiết, khía cạnh nhỏ
examples: For more details on the discount program.
Details of the merger with Belle Cosmetics.
A report which details the company's performance.

card144.meaning: bộ phận, phòng ban, cục, bộ

card145.meaning: sự thanh toán, khoản thanh toán, sự trả công
examples: Appreciate the prompt payment of the bill.

card146.meaning: công trường, thực vật, nhà máy
examples: Plants that are native to the area.
Find more about the job opportunity at...
Have the opportunity to interview sb.

card148.meaning: quy trình, thủ tục, trình tự

examples: Present Ms. Pearce with an award for her outstanding effort.

card150.meaning: hướng dẫn, chỉ thị, lời chỉ dẫn
examples: Read all the instructions contained in the manual.

card151.meaning: bài phát biểu, thuyết trình, việc tặng, biểu (quà, giải thưởng)
examples: Prepare a comprehensive presentation on workplace policies.
Contact Mr. Keys for technical assistance.
Be delayed due to technical problems.

card153.meaning: phát biểu, trình bày, trao tặng (giải thưởng, quà tặng)
examples: Be required to present photo identification.
Present one's card at the main entrance.
Present Mr. Smith with an award.

card154.meaning: tiếp cận, sử dụng, truy cập
examples: Get unlimited access to the database.
Have access to a number of recreation areas.
Expand its business further by V-ing.

card156.meaning: rời khỏi, bỏ lại, để lại
examples: Left the handouts on one's desk.
Remain open for a limited time only.
The main theme at the next business forum.
Mainly due to the increased cost.
It is necessary to make a reservation in advance.
Be recommended by one's previous employer.

card161.meaning: về (ai, cái gì), liên quan đến, đối với
examples: Have questions regarding the new product.
Customer complaints regarding the newly-launched cable channel.
Will resume as soon as possible.
Will resume one's duties in a week.

card163.meaning: cấp trên, người quản lý, giám sát viên
examples: All employees will meet their supervisors to discuss next year's business plan.
The department supervisor gave the intern an assignment.
Make this year's event the most popular ever.

card165.meaning: phản hồi, trả lời, phản ứng, đáp lại
examples: Respond to all inquiries regarding the negotiation.
Respond to all customer complaints about the equipment.
If you have not already done...
Employees who have already turned in a registration form.

card167.meaning: phương tiện, phương tiện giao thông
examples: Be required to register one's vehicle.
Your vehicle can be parked in our garage for free.

card168.meaning: sự tiến bộ, phát triển, cải tiến

examples: Be welcome to use the battery chargers.
The release of a new book.
The most direct route to the conference center.
Direct all questions to the customer service department.
Under the direction of Dr. Sun.
The number of participants is limited to 30.
24 hours prior to the scheduled event.

card174.meaning: đăng ký mua sản phẩm dài hạn (báo/tạp chí định kỳ)

card175.meaning: có hiệu quả, có hiệu lực, được tiến hành
examples: Highly effective measures to reduce costs.
Be recognized for effectively managing projects.

card176.meaning: sự chú ý, tập trung, quan tâm
examples: Any issues requiring the supervisor's immediate attention.
Attention to detail is required in this project.

card177.meaning: phương hướng, sự chỉ đạo, hướng dẫn
examples: Submit all expense reports directly to the accounting manager.
Maintain our lead over our competitors.
Congratulate the sales staff on their excellent performance.
Describe areas of growth during the past year.

card181.meaning: duy trì, tiếp tục, bảo quản
examples: Keep the document in a secure place.
Keep up with advances in technology.
Generate a significant amount of profits.
Restrict the amount of sugar we consume.
The error in the amount charged for...
In order to activate your membership immediately.
Report to the security desk immediately upon arrival.

card185.meaning: sự chịu trách nhiệm, nhiệm vụ
examples: It is your responsibility to do...
The details of your new responsibilities.
One of the major responsibilities is to do...

card186.meaning: thuộc nguồn gốc, căn nguyên, bản gốc, độc đáo

card187.meaning: đại hội, hội nghị, hiệp định
examples: The workshops at the recent convention.
Give a presentation at a convention.

card188.meaning: một cách dễ dàng, đơn giản
examples: Easily access personal information on the website.

card189.meaning: sự duy trì, giữ gìn, bảo trì, bảo dưỡng
examples: Provide a professional automotive maintenance service.
Renew a contract for maintenance of...
Be surprised at how quickly the business has become successful.

card191.meaning: giao thông, vận tải, sự chuyển chở
examples: Request transportation from the office to the factory.
The updated version of the employee manual.

card193.meaning: phản ứng, sự hồi âm, trả lời
examples: Be pleased with the enthusiastic response.
In response to complaints from customers.

card194.meaning: có trách nhiệm, có đạo đức, chịu trách nhiệm
examples: Be responsible for the completion of the hotel renovation.

card195.meaning: sự lựa chọn, tuyển chọn, phân loại
examples: Offer a wide selection of gift items.
Carry a large selection of gardening tools.
Cancel the conference due to bad weather.
Consider it necessary to cancel the event.
Be obligated to attend the meeting.
Feel obligated to complete the task by the deadline.
The benefit of the new policy is increased productivity.
The company's strategy led to increased sales.
